snippet: A judge in the court-martial of Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, the Army psychiatrist accused in a shooting rampage at Fort Hood, instructed prospective jurors to return home while the court clears up logistical and legal issues.
abstract: Col Tara A Osborn, judge overseeing court-martial of Maj Nidal Malik Hasan, Amy psychiatrist accused in Fort Hood shooting rampage, instructs prospective jurors from other posts to return home while court clears up logistical and legal issues arising from Hasan's decision to represent himself.
lead_paragraph: A judge in the court-martial of Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, the Army psychiatrist accused in a shooting rampage at Fort Hood, instructed prospective jurors to return home while the court clears up logistical and legal issues.

headline.seo: Judge Gives Fort Hood Suspect More Time to Prepare Defense
headline.main: Fort Hood Suspect Given More Time to Prepare Defense, Most Likely Delaying Trial
headline.print_headline: Fort Hood Suspect Given More Time to Prepare Defense, Most Likely Delaying Trial

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
